name: phobetor/rabbitmq-supervisor-bundle
description: Symfony bundle to automatically create and update supervisor configurations for RabbitMQ consumer daemons

suggest.php-amqplib/rabbitmq-bundle: The rabbitmq bundle for symfony which this bundle takes the consumer information from
suggest.oldsound/rabbitmq-bundle: The abandoned older version of php-amqplib/rabbitmq-bundle which also works
